MagneticReadoutProcessing.MRPAnalysis

class MRPAnalysis.MRPAnalysis(_reading: <module 'MagneticReadoutProcessing.MRPReading' from '/Users/marcelochsendorf/Downloads/MagneticReadoutProcessing/MagneticReadoutProcessing/MRPReading.py'>)

Provides functions to merge two reading, apply calibration measurements

static apply_calibration_data_inplace(_calibration_reading: <module 'MagneticReadoutProcessing.MRPReading' from '/Users/marcelochsendorf/Downloads/MagneticReadoutProcessing/MagneticReadoutProcessing/MRPReading.py'>, _current_reading: <module 'MagneticReadoutProcessing.MRPReading' from '/Users/marcelochsendorf/Downloads/MagneticReadoutProcessing/MagneticReadoutProcessing/MRPReading.py'>)

apply a reference reading as baseline to a given reading. If a given datapoint is present in both readings the following calculation will be applied: current[datapoint].value = current[datapoint].value - calibration[datapoint].value

_current_reading is a reference and modified values are updated directly.

Parameters:

  • _calibration_reading (MRPReading) – reference reading, will be applied to _current_reading

  • _current_reading (MRPReading) – to this

static search_reading_for_value(_reading: MRPReading, _phi: float, _theta: float) → float

returns a value from a given reading according a given _phi _theta values

Parameters:

  • _reading (MRPReading) – reading with data to search in

  • _phi (float) – polar coordinates phi value

  • _theta (float) – polar coordinates theta value

Returns:

value, if value found else None

Return type:

float

static search_reading_for_value_numpy(_reading: MRPReading, _search: ndarray) → float

returns a value from a given reading according a given search parameter [_phi, _theata, None]

Parameters:

  • _reading (MRPReading) – reading with data to search in

  • _search (numpy.ndarray) – numpy.ndarray [phi, theta, X]

Returns:

value if value found else None

Return type:

float

with_traceback()
